# shipped.fyi

> Simple feedback board, roadmap, and changelog tool for your product.

## About

shipped.fyi is a product feedback management tool that helps teams:
- Collect user feedback through a public feedback board
- Organize features with categories
- Track progress with a public roadmap
- Celebrate shipped features with a changelog
- Notify voters when their requested features ship

## Features

### Feedback Board
Public-facing board where users can submit ideas and vote on features they want built.

### Roadmap
Visual representation of what's planned and in progress.

### Changelog
Celebrate shipped features and keep users informed of progress.

### Categories
Organize feedback items by type (Bug, Feature, Enhancement, etc.)

### Voter Notifications
Users can opt-in to receive email notifications when features they voted for ship.

## Blog & Content

shipped.fyi publishes content about product feedback, roadmaps, and building products:

### Blog
Long-form articles about product management, feedback collection, and building better products.
- URL: https://shipped.fyi/blog
- Topics: Product feedback, roadmaps, changelogs, indie hacking, product management

### Updates (Changelog)
Product updates and new feature announcements for shipped.fyi itself.
- URL: https://shipped.fyi/updates

### RSS Feed
Subscribe to all content (blog posts and product updates):
- URL: https://shipped.fyi/feed.xml

## Pricing

- **Free Plan**: 1 project, 50 items, core features
- **Pro Plan ($9/month)**: Unlimited projects, unlimited items, remove branding

## Public URLs

shipped.fyi is built with Next.js and Supabase. Public pages include:

### Marketing & Content
- Homepage: https://shipped.fyi
- Blog: https://shipped.fyi/blog
- Updates: https://shipped.fyi/updates
- Pricing: https://shipped.fyi/pricing
- RSS Feed: https://shipped.fyi/feed.xml

### User Projects
Public boards are accessible at:
- Feedback: `https://shipped.fyi/{project-slug}`
- Roadmap: `https://shipped.fyi/{project-slug}/roadmap`
- Changelog: `https://shipped.fyi/{project-slug}/changelog`

## Contact

- Website: https://shipped.fyi
- Support: support@shipped.fyi
